mvpoly
======

A package for the numeric treatment of multivariate polynomials.

This is a pre-alpha package, much of the functionality is not yet
implemented.

Documentation can be found at 
`pythonhosted <http://pythonhosted.org/mvpoly>`_, the package
homepage is 
`here <http://soliton.vm.bytemark.co.uk/pub/jjg/en/code/mvpoly.html>`_.
